description: Developed and maintained responsive full-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable features for client projects. Implemented SEO strategies, driving measurable organic traffic growth and improving website visibility and engagement.
achievements: Developed and maintained responsive full-stack applications using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable features
Implemented SEO strategies that improved website visibility and organic traffic
Ensured seamless functionality and excellent user experience across platforms
Worked on multiple client projects with high performance and reliability standards

description: Represented Corizo as a Campus Ambassador, promoting brand awareness and fostering student engagement. Executed digital marketing campaigns across social media platforms, boosting visibility and lead generation. Built and maintained relationships with students, faculty, and peers to expand outreach and strengthen brand presence. Organized and marketed workshops, webinars, and events, successfully driving student participation and engagement.
achievements: Represented Corizo as Campus Ambassador, promoting brand awareness
Executed digital marketing campaigns across social media platforms
Built and maintained relationships with students, faculty, and peers
Organized and marketed workshops, webinars, and events
Successfully drove student participation and engagement
Boosted visibility and lead generation through strategic campaigns

description: Designed and developed a Network Traffic Anomaly Detection system to identify unusual patterns and potential security threats using Machine Learning techniques. Built an interactive Streamlit-based UI for real-time anomaly visualization and user interaction. Preprocessed large-scale network datasets, applying feature engineering and normalization for model accuracy. Implemented and tested multiple ML algorithms (e.g., Random Forest, Logistic Regression) to enhance detection system performance. Integrated prediction logic with a user-friendly interface, improving system usability and efficiency.
achievements: Designed and developed Network Traffic Anomaly Detection system
Built interactive Streamlit-based UI for real-time visualization
Preprocessed large-scale network datasets with feature engineering
Implemented multiple ML algorithms (Random Forest, Logistic Regression)
Integrated prediction logic with user-friendly interface
Improved system usability and detection efficiency
